embeds.title: Luck of the Draw
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / 1 :energy_hermit:  / The Hermit / Downfall

Draw until you draw 3 (4) total :energy_hermit:  worth of cards.

messages.content: One of Hermit's few sources of strong draw
works well with curses
generally pretty good, you just don't want to take too many high-cost or cost-increasing cards with this
me likey
also good for madness shenanigans
you also take glare more preferentially
with this
I tend to use madness a lot in standard mode since the vanilla character I come back to the most is defect and 0 cost coolheaded good
and madness good here as well
hermit has other 0 costs but they're not as interesting tbh
feint is okay
<feint> is like half a deflect and half a flex stapled together

embeds.title: Feint
embeds.description:
Common Skill / 0 :energy_hermit:  / The Hermit / Downfall

Gain 3 (5) **Block** :p_block:.
Apply 2 (3) **Bruise** :p_bruise: to ALL enemies.

messages.content: good with red scarf
<called shot> is ok ish but just not really interesting

embeds.title: Called Shot
embeds.description:
Common Attack / 0 :energy_hermit:  / The Hermit / Downfall

 (**Retain**.)
Deal 5 (7) damage.
If the last card played this turn triggered Dead On, draw a card.

messages.content: i'd rather just take stuff like headshot
if i'm going dead on
enervate > headshot generally imo
enervate is kind of crazy
especially 0 cost enervate from power eternal or madness
enervate is basically this except you can recur enervate with combo
power eternal?
<power eternal>

embeds.title: Eternal Form
embeds.description:
Rare Power / 3 :energy_hermit:  / The Hermit / Downfall

â€‹~~- **Ethereal**. -~~
First 4 playable cards drawn at the start of each turn cost 1 less that turn.

messages.content: i mean it's "this turn until played" so
I mean it's still free +1 draw +1 energy with it
more like free 7 dmg +1 energy since it just replaces itself
cantrips are fine but not that interesting inherently, unless you're setting up infinite i suppose
combo?
combo it and it's draw 2 minimum
if you're comboing it you could also be comboing another dead on card
yeah but combo is insanely energy hungry
i simply don't take combo without eternal form
combo enervate lets you play the entire combo out
since eternal form is functionally +4 energy
eternal form is literally just good it's like saying echo form is good

but yeah
when you take eternal form you want card draw or pseudo card draw
combo works
2+ luck of the draw works
fatal desire works
I suppose splashing some vantages might help
when you see eternal form early you literally have to stop everything and immediately pivot and make the entire deck made around it
Incidentally, I'm pretty sure the eternal form bug with it's "first 4 playable" not working and just being "first 4" is still there
i mean you do kinda just take more stuff you already wanted, but now you want them more because eternal form

energy/cheating stuff like cheat or eye of the storm to get eternal form out in the first place (though cheat is better)
draw which is already good
and you deprioritize glare i guess

I usually play hermit for dead on in which case this card is not nearly as strong as it is in his other builds, but even then it's not bad. Played fairly it's usually just 3 cards which is considered the baseline for pure draw. With potential for more.
But almost all his other draw are dead on cards so I don't need it in that build
Not as much
dead on likes zero costs though
Yeah but it's not quite the same as the inherent synergy with curses
And it doesn't recognize enervate as being effectively 0 energy
<enervate>

embeds.title: Enervate
embeds.description:
Uncommon Attack / 1 :energy_hermit:  / The Hermit / Downfall

Deal 7 (10) damage.
**Dead On:**
Gain :energy_hermit:  and draw a card.

messages.content:
Probably hermitâ€™s best way to draw cards. 0 cost cards (including most curses) donâ€™t count against you, so this can sometimes draw more than 3 (4) cards. If your deck has a lot of expensive/cost increasing cards, it does get a little worse. If you put a premium on glare, virtue, take cover, or called shot (all are pretty solid), or are using shadow cloak, this gets much better. I find that most of the time, it checking costs ends up being in your favor, and it usually draws 3-4 cards. Can be very useful to enable dead-on for cards that are currently in the far right of your hand as well. Itâ€™s great to quickly get to your scaling powers in time, and if you have 4 energy and play this first, you should still usually be able to afford playing whatever it drew.  

The other card draw on hermit is a bit conditional, so this stands out because it is so generally useful. Covet needs an upgrade to be card draw, vantage requires triggering dead-on, quickdraw has a drawback that you usually need to mitigate, high noon requires keeping/playing strikes and defends, overwhelming power hurts you the longer the fight goes on, and fatal desire makes your second cycle worse and hurts dead-on. Luck of the draw in comparison is very low maintenance. I would advise against taking this too early in the run, itâ€™s fairly poor in act 1, though it can be cute to draw through dazes in tri-sentries, most of the time you will be spending an energy just to draw more strikes and defends. 

It improves significantly once your deck has better cards in it to draw towards, and once you have 4 energy so you can more comfortably spend some of it on utility effects like this rather than just attacking and blocking. However, since it is such a premium source of card draw, you can get a big greedy and take this if you see it early, shoring up your late game at the cost of some early game power, especially viable if you have already taken multiple good 0-cost cards.

The upgrade is usually very good, and pays off well in the late game. It can help smooth out some of the variance in the card, and make it more likely that you will dig past multiple curses or 0 cost cards, making it more forgiving if you hit a 2 or 3 cost early in the effect as well. Pairs well with ink bottle, letter opener, and sometimes ninja relics like kunai as they all want lots of cheap cards (enervate, called shot, golden bullet, final canter).
